channel.title: [PI] need help :(
channel.description:
Hello, well i added a new NPCdrop System, And stuff, you know the
npcid,itemid,amount,Rarity.
But now everytime i try to add more npcs to my SpawnAutoConfig, i get this error. [code=java] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1183 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2925) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:63) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
1 of my friends said it might be because i need to increase my Array, on Npchandler.java so i increased to 20000, instead of 10000 and i still have the same problem. any help is appreciated.

item.title: [PI] need help :(
item.dc:creator: @extinct2255 extinct2255
item.description:
@extinct2255 wrote:

I see you dont understand my problem :P,

My drops are fine, it’s my system, when you kill a npc You do not Get KILLCOUNT anymore, And the RFD minigame does not show the items it normally does when u complete the minigame.

It normally showed all pairs of gloves on completion.

If u killed first 1 u’d get first pair of gloves e.g

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] need help :(
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Stop double posting.

The drops are handled in Config.java on DSPK, which is abit shit to be honest.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] need help :(
item.dc:creator: @extinct2255 extinct2255
item.description:
@extinct2255 wrote:

i have increased the Array on Npchandler.java

it was set to 10000, so i changed to 20000.

Still same problem.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] need help :(
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

Increasing the array should have worked, try going to the line it is saying, have a look at it, it may be wrong, if it isnt, i am not sure of the problem.

Read full topic
